fixes.name: Percentage
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau row-level calculated field [Percentage] = [Ratio] / 0.543 into a Power BI calculated column that performs the same per-row division using 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[Ratio].

fixes.name: wc_percentage
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau's WINDOW_MAX(MAX([Percentage])) is a table calculation that computes the maximum of the aggregated [Percentage] across the window. In Power BI this is implemented as a measure. The expression uses MAXX over ALLSELECTED('Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)') to emulate the window-level maximum of 'Sheet1 (radial_bar_chart_data)'[Percentage].
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation contains a table calculation (WINDOW_MAX) and an aggregation, so it must be created as a measure.
